alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:04PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sullivan, central Russell and Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 600 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walnut Hill, or near Bristol Tn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Walnut Hill, Bluff City, Glade Spring, Honaker, Emory-Meadow View and Rosedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
